framework.control

Class Broker

  • java.lang.Object
    • framework.control.Broker

  • public class Broker
extends java.lang.Object
    Manages and controls connections between modules.
    Author:
    Stefan Werner

                                 boolean removeConnectionsCompletely)
        Disconnects connection to a given prosumer port, optionally removing connection from database.
        Parameters:
        prosumerPort - the prosumer port to remove connection from
        removeConnectionsCompletely - set to true to remove connections completely (from database)
        Returns:
        the port tuple

      • findExistingProsumerPort

        private ProsumerPort findExistingProsumerPort(java.lang.String moduleId,
                                              java.lang.String portId)
        Finds existing prosumer port object for given IDs. The port object instance is used as a kind of token so it needs to be reused.
        Parameters:
        moduleId - the module ID
        portId - the port ID
        Returns:
        the prosumer port found (may be null if none)

      • findExistingProviderPort

        Parameters:
        moduleId - the module ID
        portId - the port ID
        Returns:
        the provider port found (may be null if none)

                                               long lastUpdate)

        providerPort - the provider port
        isActive - true, if active
        priority - the priority
        dataTransfered - the data transfered by now
        lastUpdate - the last update date
        Returns:
        the connection summary
